tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.ProjectTaxon
tuningTable.sql: create unique index projtax_ix&1 on &prefixProjectTaxon&1 (taxon, project_id)

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.OrganismAbbreviationWS
tuningTable.sql: create unique index projtax_ix&1 on &prefixProjectTaxon&1 (taxon, project_id)

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.EstAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index EstAttr_source_id&1 ON ApidbTuning.EstAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index GeneAttr_srcPrj&1 ON ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.GeneId

source.query: select gi.id,gi.gene, gi.database_name from ApidbTuning.GeneId@trich.tuning gi, ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes@trich.tuning ga where gi.gene = ga.source_id and ga.project_id = 'TrichDB'
select gi.id,gi.gene, gi.database_name from ApidbTuning.GeneId@amoeba.tuning gi, ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes@amoeba.tuning ga where gi.gene = ga.source_id and ga.project_id = 'AmoebaDB'

tuningTable.sql: CREATE INDEX ApidbTuning.GeneId_gene_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.GeneId&1 (gene) tablespace indx
CREATE INDEX ApidbTuning.GeneId_id_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.GeneId&1 (id) tablespace indx
CREATE INDEX ApidbTuning.GeneId_lowid_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.GeneId&1 (lower(id), gene) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.OrganismAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index OrganismAttr_sourceId_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.OrganismAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx
GRANT select ON apidbtuning.organismAttributes&1 TO apidb

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.IsolateAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index IsolateAttr_sourceId_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.IsolateAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.OrfAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index OrfAttr_source_id&1 ON ApidbTuning.OrfAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx
create index OrfAttr_location_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.OrfAttributes&1 (na_sequence_id, start_min, end_max, is_reversed) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.SageTagAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index SageTagAttr_sourceId_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.SageTagAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx
create index SageTagAttr_loc_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.SageTagAttributes&1 (na_sequence_id, start_min, end_max, is_reversed, source_id) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index pk_SeqAttr_&1 ON ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id)
grant select ON apidbTuning.SequenceAttributes&1 TO public

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.SequenceId

source.query: select gi.id,gi.sequence from ApidbTuning.SequenceId@trich.tuning gi, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes@trich.tuning ga where gi.sequence = ga.source_id and ga.project_id = 'TrichDB'
select gi.id,gi.sequence from ApidbTuning.SequenceId@amoeba.tuning gi, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes@amoeba.tuning ga where gi.sequence = ga.source_id and ga.project_id = 'AmoebaDB'
select gi.id,gi.sequence from ApidbTuning.SequenceId@micro.tuning gi, ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes@micro.tuning ga where gi.sequence = ga.source_id and ga.project_id = 'MicrosporidiaDB'

tuningTable.sql: CREATE INDEX ApidbTuning.SequenceId_sequence_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.SequenceId&1 (sequence) tablespace indx
CREATE INDEX ApidbTuning.SequenceId_id_idx&1 ON ApidbTuning.SequenceId&1 (id) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.SnpAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create unique index SnpAttr_source_id&1 ON ApidbTuning.SnpAttributes&1 (source_id, project_id)

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence
tuningTable.sql: create table TranscriptSequenceToxo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@toxo.tuning
create table TranscriptSequenceCrypto nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@crypto.tuning
create table TranscriptSequenceGiardia nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@giardia.tuning
create table TranscriptSequencePlasmo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@plasmo.tuning
create table TranscriptSequenceTrich nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@trich.tuning where project_id = 'TrichDB'
create table TranscriptSequenceTriTryp nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@tritryp.tuning
create table TranscriptSequenceAmoeba nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@amoeba.tuning where project_id = 'AmoebaDB'
create table TranscriptSequenceMicro nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@micro.tuning where project_id = 'MicrosporidiaDB'
create table TranscriptSequencePiro nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence@piro.tuning

create table TranscriptSequence&1 nologging as ( select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequenceCrypto union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequenceGiardia union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequencePlasmo union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequenceToxo union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequenceTrich union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequenceTritryp union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequenceAmoeba union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequenceMicro union all select * from ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequencePiro )
create index XScriptSeq_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx

create table CodingSequence&1 nologging as ( select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequenceCrypto union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequenceGiardia union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequencePlasmo union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequenceToxo union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequenceTrich union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequenceTritryp union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequenceAmoeba union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequenceMicro union all select * from ApidbTuning.CodingSequencePiro )
create index cds_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.CodingSequence&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx

create table EstSequencePlasmo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.EstSequence@plasmo.tuning
create table EstSequenceToxo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.EstSequence@toxo.tuning

create table AssemblySequenceGiardia nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.AssemblySequence@giardia.tuning
create table AssemblySequencePlasmo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.AssemblySequence@plasmo.tuning
create table AssemblySequenceToxo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.AssemblySequence@toxo.tuning
create table AssemblySequenceTrich nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.AssemblySequence@trich.tuning where project_id = 'TrichDB'
create table AssemblySequenceTriTryp nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.AssemblySequence@tritryp.tuning

tuningTable.sql: create table IsolateSequenceCrypto nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@crypto.tuning
create table IsolateSequenceGiardia nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@giardia.tuning
create table IsolateSequencePlasmo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@plasmo.tuning
create table IsolateSequenceToxo nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@toxo.tuning
create table IsolateSequenceTrich nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@trich.tuning where project_id = 'TrichDB'
create table IsolateSequenceTriTryp nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@tritryp.tuning
create table IsolateSequenceAmoeba nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@amoeba.tuning where project_id = 'AmoebaDB'
create table IsolateSequenceMicro nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@micro.tuning where project_id = 'MicrosporidiaDB'
create table IsolateSequencePiro nologging as select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence@piro.tuning

create table IsolateSequence&1 nologging as ( select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequenceCrypto union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequenceGiardia union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequencePlasmo union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequenceToxo union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequenceTrich union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequenceAmoeba union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequenceMicro union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequenceTritryp union all select * from ApidbTuning.IsolateSequencePiro )
create index IsolateSeq_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence&1 (source_id, project_id) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.Statistics
tuningTable.sql: create table Statistics&1 nologging as select taxa.project_id, taxa.organism, genes.gene_count, transcripts.transcript_count, cdss.cds_count, proteins.protein_count, sequences.sequence_count, sequences.total_sequence_length, orfs.orf_count, ests.est_count from (select project_id, organism from ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes union select project_id, organism from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes union select project_id, organism from ApidbTuning.EstAttributes union select project_id, organism from ApidbTuning.OrfAttributes union select project_id, organism from ApidbTuning.OrfAttributes) taxa, (select project_id, organism, count(*) gene_count from ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes group by project_id, organism) genes, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) transcript_count from ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga, ApidbTuning.TranscriptSequence ts where ga.source_id = ts.source_id and ga.project_id = ts.project_id and ts.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) transcripts, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) cds_count from ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga, ApidbTuning.CodingSequence seq where ga.source_id = seq.source_id and ga.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) cdss, (select ga.project_id, ga.organism, count(*) protein_count from ApidbTuning.GeneAttributes ga, ApidbTuning.ProteinSequence seq where ga.source_id = seq.source_id and ga.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by ga.project_id, ga.organism) proteins, (select project_id, organism, count(*) sequence_count, sum(length) total_sequence_length from ApidbTuning.SequenceAttributes sa where is_top_level = 1 group by project_id, organism) sequences, (select attrs.project_id, attrs.organism, count(*) orf_count from ApidbTuning.OrfAttributes attrs, ApidbTuning.OrfSequence seq where attrs.source_id = seq.source_id and attrs.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by attrs.project_id, attrs.organism) orfs, (select attrs.project_id, attrs.organism, count(*) est_count from ApidbTuning.EstAttributes attrs, ApidbTuning.EstSequence seq where attrs.source_id = seq.source_id and attrs.project_id = seq.project_id and seq.sequence is not null group by attrs.project_id, attrs.organism) ests where taxa.project_id = genes.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = genes.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = transcripts.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = transcripts.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = cdss.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = cdss.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = proteins.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = proteins.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = sequences.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = sequences.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = orfs.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = orfs.organism(+) and taxa.project_id = ests.project_id(+) and taxa.organism = ests.organism(+) order by taxa.project_id, taxa.organism

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.IsolateStatistics
tuningTable.sql: create table IsolateStatistics&1 nologging as select project_id, genus, count(*) isolate_count from (select ia.project_id, substr(ia.organism, 1, instr(ia.organism||' ', ' ') - 1) genus from ApidbTuning.IsolateAttributes ia, ApidbTuning.IsolateSequence iseq where ia.source_id = iseq.source_id and ia.project_id = iseq.project_id) group by project_id, genus order by project_id, genus

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation
tuningTable.sql: create index featloc_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation&1 (feature_type, na_sequence_id, start_min, end_max, is_reversed, feature_source_id, na_feature_id) tablespace indx
create index featloc2_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation&1 (na_sequence_id, start_min, end_max, is_reversed, sequence_ontology_id) tablespace indx
create index fl_seq_st_end_feat_idx&1 on ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation&1 (na_sequence_id,start_min,end_max,na_feature_id) tablespace indx
create index featloc3_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation&1 (na_feature_id, na_sequence_id, is_top_level) tablespace indx
create index featloc4_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation&1 (feature_type, is_top_level, na_feature_id) tablespace indx
create index featloc5_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation&1 (na_sequence_id, feature_type, start_min, end_max, parent_id, na_feature_id) tablespace indx
create index featloc6_ix&1 on ApidbTuning.FeatureLocation&1 (feature_source_id, is_top_level, na_sequence_id, is_reversed) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes
tuningTable.sql: create table CompoundAttributes&1 nologging as ( select t.*, 'PlasmoDB' as project_id from ApidbTuning.CompoundAttributes@plasmo.tuning t )

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.GeneWord
tuningTable.sql: create index GeneWord_idx&1 ON GeneWord&1 (source_id) tablespace indx

tuningTable.name: ApidbTuning.GoTermSummary
tuningTable.sql: create index GoTermSummary_idx&1 ON GoTermSummary&1 (source_id) tablespace indx
